mutants.code:
def num_of_subsets(N, Arr):
    mod = 1000000008
    mn = min(Arr)
    mx = max(Arr)
    mnc = Arr.count(mn)
    mxc = Arr.count(mx)
    r1 = pow(2, mnc, mod) - 1
    r2 = pow(2, mxc, mod) - 1
    return (r2, r1)
